name: src/SpeechYL.es6.js
SpeechYL
description: Library Web Speech Recognition & Web Speech Synthesis

name: constructor
description: Default constructor

name: recognition
description: SpeechRecognition Object from Web API SpeechRecognition

name: synthesis
description: SpeechSynthesis Object from Web API SpeechSynthesis

name: utterance
description: SpeechSynthesisUtterance Object from Web API SpeechSynthesis

name: lastTranscript
description: The last transcript from SpeechRecognition

name: synthText
description: The last text from SpeechSynthesis

name: commands
description: Object that contains recognition and speech commands.

name: commandsFunc
description: Object that contains all functions listed in 'commands' object

name: voices
description: List of SpeechSynthesisVoice objects representing all the available voices on the current device.

name: setLang
description: Set lang for synthesis and recognition speech.

name: synthesisLang
description: Set the language for speech synthesis (ex : "en-EN", "fr-FR")

name: recognitionLang
description: Set the language for speech recognition (ex : "en-EN", "fr-FR")

name: voice
description: Set the language for speech synthesis (ex : "en-EN", "fr-FR")

name: maxAlternatives
description: Sets the maximum number of SpeechRecognitionAlternatives provided per result. The default value is 1.

name: serviceURI
description:
Specifies the location of the speech recognition service used by the current SpeechRecognition
to handle the actual recognition. The default is the user agent's default speech service.

name: onaudiostart
description: Fired when the user agent has started to capture audio.

name: onaudioend
description: Fired when the user agent has finished capturing audio.

name: onend
description: Fired when the speech recognition service has disconnected.

name: onerror
description: Fired when a speech recognition error occurs.

name: onnomatch
description: Fired when the speech recognition service returns a final result with no significant recognition. This may involve some degree of recognition, which doesn't meet or exceed the confidence threshold.

name: onresult
description: Fired when the speech recognition service returns a result — a word or phrase has been positively recognized and this has been communicated back to the app.

name: onsoundstart
description: Fired when any sound — recognisable speech or not — has been detected.

name: onsoundend
description: Fired when any sound — recognisable speech or not — has stopped being detected.

name: onspeechstart
description: Fired when sound that is recognised by the speech recognition service as speech has been detected.

name: onspeechend
description: Fired when speech recognised by the speech recognition service has stopped being detected.

name: onstart
description: Fired when the speech recognition service has begun listening to incoming audio with intent to recognize grammars associated with the current SpeechRecognition.

name: onvoiceschanged
description: Fired when the list of SpeechSynthesisVoice objects that would be returned by the SpeechSynthesis.getVoices() method has changed.

name: synthCancel
description: Removes all utterances from the utterance queue.

name: synthPause
description: Puts the SpeechSynthesis object into a paused state.

name: synthResume
description: Puts the SpeechSynthesis object into a non-paused state: resumes it if it was already paused.

name: recogAbort
description: Stops the speech recognition service from listening to incoming audio, and doesn't attempt to return a SpeechRecognitionResult.

name: recogStart
description: Starts the speech recognition service listening to incoming audio with intent to recognize grammars associated with the current SpeechRecognition.

name: recogStop
description: Stops the speech recognition service from listening to incoming audio, and attempts to return a SpeechRecognitionResult using the audio captured so far.

name: speak
description: Adds an utterance to the utterance queue; it will be spoken when any other utterances queued before it have been spoken.

params.name: sentence
params.description: The sentence that is said by the speech synthesis

name: say
description: Say a sentence using speech synthesis
examples:
let speechYL = new SpeechYL();
speechYL.say("Hello world!");

params.name: sentence
params.description: The sentence that is said by the speech synthesis

name: isWordSaid
description: Know if the word is said by the user

return.description: Return true if the word is said by the user

name: isSentenceSaid
description: Know if the sentence is said by the user

return.description: Return true if the sentence is said by the user

name: saySentenceAfterRecognition
description: Say sentence if the recognition sentence is recognize

params.name: sentenceRecognition
params.description: Sentence said by the user and recognize

return.description: Return true if the sentence is said by the user

name: saySentenceFromData
description: Execute action if the transcript is in the data

return.description: Return true if the transcript is in the data

name: launchFunc
description: Execute function in commandsFunc

name: getSynthesisSentence
access:
private
Get synthesis sentence based on weight and language

name: getFunction
access:
private
Get name of the function based on weight

name: formatTranscript
access:
private
Format the transcript (lowercase and first space remove)

name: actionDataType
description: Launch actions if the recognition sentence from the data is recognize

name: actionData
description: Launch actions if the recognition sentence from the data is recognize

name: actionDataStart
description: Launch actions if the beginning of the recognition sentence from the data is recognize

name: actionDataInclude
description: Launch actions if a part of the recognition sentence from the data is recognize

name: computeTotalWeight
access:
private
Compute the total weight of an array of object

unknown.tagValue: {number} The total weight of the array

return.description: The total weight of the array

name: retrieveData
access:
private
Retrieve data based on the type (normal, start, include)
